T06TD4020E:20b-0: @20b ye shes rnam pa gnyis po dag / bsgom phyir rab tu sbyong bar byed //
T06TD4020E:20b-1: rnam par mi rtog ye shes de //
T06TD4020E:20b-2: sangs rgyas chos ni sbyong bar byed //
T06TD4020E:20b-3: gzhan ni ji bzhin rnam 'jog pa //
T06TD4020E:20b-4: sems can rnams ni yongs smin byed //
T06TD4020E:20b-5: grangs med gnyis ni rdzogs pa yis //
T06TD4020E:20b-6: bsgom pa yi ni tshar phyin te //
T06TD4020E:20b-7: bsgom pa tha ma thob nas ni //
T06TD4020E:20b-8: byang chub sems dpa' dbang bskur ba //
T06TD4020E:20b-9: rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin //
T06TD4020E:20b-10: rtog pas mi shigs thob nas ni //
T06TD4020E:20b-11: gnas gzhan gyur pas mthar thug pa //
T06TD4020E:20b-12: sgrib pa kun gyi dri med pa //
T06TD4020E:20b-13: gang la gnas nas sems can kun //
T06TD4020E:20b-14: phan phyir rab tu sgrub byed pa //
T06TD4020E:20b-15: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa yi //
T06TD4020E:20b-17: de ltar mthong dka'i thub pa rtag mthong ba //
T06TD4020E:20b-18: thos pa mnyam med las byung rab dang ba'i //
T06TD4020E:20b-19: shugs kyis rtag par shin tu sems tshim la ;
T06TD4020E:20b-20: / ji lta bur na don chen 'gyur ma yin //
T06TD4020E:20b-21: chos kyi sgo la rnam par gnas pa la //
T06TD4020E:20b-22: de bzhin gshegs rtag mngon sum 'doms mdzad cing //
T06TD4020E:20b-23: co nas 'dren bzhin nyes pa'i tshang tshing nas //
T06TD4020E:20b-24: mtshan gyis drangs te byang chub la dgod do //
T06TD4020E:20b-25: sangs rgyas rnams ni rtag tu rang don yang dag sbyor la legs par bsngags pa dang //
T06TD4020E:20b-26: log par sbyor la smod mdzad gnas dang rnam 'byed lhur len mchog gi sems can la //
T06TD4020E:20b-27: gang zhig spangs dang bsten pas de gshegs bstan pa 'di la rnal 'byor yangs 'gyur ba //
T06TD4020E:20b-28: bar chad mthun pa'i chos ni rnam pa thams cad rgyal rnams tshul bzhin 'di na ston //
T06TD4020E:20b-29: de ni mthong ba rab dag mi rtog byang chub kyis //
T06TD4020E:20b-30: 'jig rten thams cad zil mnan mun pa chen po yang //
T06TD4020E:20b-31: rnam pa kun tu bsal nas nyi ma chen po dag / shar ba bzhin du 'gro ba rnams la lam me'o //
T06TD4020E:20b-32: de ltar rtag tu dge ba bsags pas rab gang zhing //
T06TD4020E:20b-33: thub pa las ni rtag tu gdams ngag che thob pa'i //
T06TD4020E:20b-34: sems dpa' mchog ni sems kyi ting 'dzin rab yangs pa //
T06TD4020E:20b-35: thob nas yon tan rgya mtsho'i pha rol 'gro bar 'gyur //
T06TD4020E:21a-2: gdams ngag rjes su bstan pa'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o /
T06TD4020E:21a-5: mos pa mang ba nyid dang ni //
T06TD4020E:21a-6: chos tshol ba dang bshad pa dang //
T06TD4020E:21a-7: de bzhin sgrub dang yang dag pa'i //
T06TD4020E:21a-8: gdams ngag rjes su bstan pa yin ;
T06TD4020E:21a-9: / ji ltar nags tshal dang ni lus can ri bo dang //
T06TD4020E:21a-10: chu bo rnams kyi rten ni kun nas sa yin pa //
T06TD4020E:21a-11: de bzhin mkhas pa rnams kyi las rnam gsum po yang //
T06TD4020E:21a-12: kun nas sbyin pa la sogs dge ba'i yin par brjod //
T06TD4020E:21a-13: shin tu dka' ba'i las ni ngo bo sna tshogs pa ;
T06TD4020E:21a-14: / bskal ba mang pos tshar phyin mngon brtson bdag nyid can //
T06TD4020E:21a-15: rgyal sras rnams ni lus dang ngag sems rang bzhin gyi //
T06TD4020E:21a-16: las rnams dag gis 'di na yid 'byung 'gyur ba med //
T06TD4020E:21a-17: ji ltar bdag la phan 'dod dug dang mtshon dang ni //
T06TD4020E:21a-18: gnam lcags lce dang dgra las rang gi lus zlog pa //
T06TD4020E:21a-19: de bzhin rgyal sras theg pa dman pa rnam gnyis las //
T06TD4020E:21a-20: las rnam gsum gyi bdag nyid zlog par byed pa yin //
T06TD4020E:21a-21: rtag tu rnam par mi rtog las can las min zhing //
T06TD4020E:21a-22: las kyi bya ba dang rnam gsum la mi lta ste //
T06TD4020E:21a-23: des na 'di ni de'i thabs yang dag gzung ba'i phyir //
T06TD4020E:21a-24: las rnams dag pa mtha' yas de yi pha rol 'gro //
T06TD4020E:21a-25: theg pa chen po mdo sde'i rgyan las /
T06TD4020E:21a-26: thabs dang ldan pa'i las kyi le'u ste bcu drug pa'o /
T06TD4020E:21a-28: // / grangs dang de yi mtshan nyid go rims dang //
T06TD4020E:21a-29: nges pa'i tshig dang yon tan goms bya dang //
T06TD4020E:21a-30: de dag rab dbye bsdu dang mi mthun phyogs //
T06TD4020E:21a-31: yon tan phan tshun rnam nges yin zhes bya //
T06TD4020E:21a-32: longs spyod dang lus phun sum tshogs pa dang //
T06TD4020E:21a-33: 'khor rtsom phun sum tshogs pa mngon mtho dang //
T06TD4020E:21a-34: rtag tu nyon mongs dbang nyid mi 'gro dang //
T06TD4020E:21a-35: bya ba rnams la phyin ci ma log pa'o //
T06TD4020E:21a-36: sems can don la rab brtson pa //
T06TD4020E:21a-37: gtong dang mi gnod bzod pas byed //

T06TD4020E:31b-0: @31b sems tsam las ni 'grub pa'i phyir //

T06TD4020E:31b-3: sna tshogs che dang byang chub par //

T06TD4020E:31b-49: de bzhin dman dang khyad par 'phags //
T06TD4020E:32a-2: 'gro med gnas pa mi rung dang //

T06TD4020E:32a-4: sems kyi rjes su 'jug pa'i phyir //
T06TD4020E:32a-5: 'dus byas thams cad skad cig ma //

T06TD4020E:32a-7: skam dang 'phel dang rang bzhin gyis //

T06TD4020E:32a-19: kun nas nyon mongs nyon mongs rgyu /

T06TD4020E:32a-44: byed pa min phyir mi rtag phyir //

T06TD4020E:32a-47: rang byung nyid du mi rung ngo //

T06TD4020E:32b-0: snga @32b na med dang mi rtag dang //

T06TD4020E:32b-2: rkyen nyid du ni mi rung ngo //

T06TD4020E:32b-6: nyes par bshad pa kho na yin //
T06TD4020E:32b-7: kun nas nyon mongs rnam byang ba'i //
T06TD4020E:32b-8: gnas skabs gcod pa'i bye brag dang //
T06TD4020E:32b-9: 'jug dang rgyun gyi bye brag kyang //
T06TD4020E:32b-10: gang zag gis ni nye bar bstan //
T06TD4020E:32b-11: bdag tu lta ba bskyed mi dgos //
T06TD4020E:32b-12: goms pa thog ma med dus can //

T06TD4020E:37b-25: de phyir sbyang dka' zhes bya'o //
T06TD4020E:37b-26: shes rab pha rol phyin brten nas //
T06TD4020E:37b-28: gnyis 'dir mngon du gyur pa'i phyir //
T06TD4020E:37b-29: mngon du gyur pa'i sa zhes bshad //
T06TD4020E:37b-30: bgrod gcig lam dang 'brel pa'i phyir //
T06TD4020E:37b-31: ring du song ba'i sar 'dod do //
T06TD4020E:37b-32: 'du shes gnyis kyis mi g-yo'i phyir //
T06TD4020E:37b-33: mi g-yo ba zhes nges par brjod ;
T06TD4020E:37b-34: / so so yang dag reg blo bzang //
T06TD4020E:37b-35: sa de legs pa'i blo gros yin //
T06TD4020E:37b-36: sprin bzhin gnyis kyis nam mkha'i chos //
T06TD4020E:37b-37: khyab pa'i phyir na chos kyi sprin //
T06TD4020E:37b-38: dge ba sgrub pa sna tshogs la //
T06TD4020E:37b-39: dga' bas rtag par thams cad du //
T06TD4020E:38a-2: sa rnams gnas pa yin par 'dod //
T06TD4020E:38a-4: dpag tu med pa de dag la //
T06TD4020E:38a-5: phyi phyir gong du 'gro ldan phyir //
T06TD4020E:38a-6: de dag nyid ni sar 'dod do //
T06TD4020E:38a-7: sa 'thob pa ni mos pa dang //
T06TD4020E:38a-8: spyod pa dag la 'jug pa dang //
T06TD4020E:38a-9: rtogs pa'i phyir dang sa rnams ni //
T06TD4020E:38a-10: 'grub pa'i sgo nas rnam ba bzhi //
T06TD4020E:38a-11: lus can theg pa chen po dang //
T06TD4020E:38a-12: theg pa dman la mos pa rnams //
T06TD4020E:38a-13: gnyis ka 'dun par bya ba dang //
T06TD4020E:38a-14: gdul ba'i phyir ni brtan rnams kyi //
T06TD4020E:38a-15: spyod pa bzhi po mdo bzhin du //
T06TD4020E:38a-16: rjes su 'brangs nas bshad pa yin //
T06TD4020E:38a-17: sems can rnams la brtse ba can //
T06TD4020E:38a-18: phrad dang bral ba'i dgongs pa can //
T06TD4020E:38a-19: mi 'bral ba yi dgongs pa can //
T06TD4020E:38a-20: phan bde dgongs khyod la phyag 'tshal //
T06TD4020E:38a-21: thub pa sgrib kun nges par grol //
T06TD4020E:38a-22: 'jig rten thams cad zil gyis gnon //
T06TD4020E:38a-23: khyod kyi mkhyen pas shes bya khyab //
T06TD4020E:38a-24: thugs grol khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
T06TD4020E:38a-25: sems can dag ni thams cad kyi //
T06TD4020E:38a-26: nyon mongs ma lus thams cad 'joms //
T06TD4020E:38a-27: nyon mongs 'joms mdzad nyon mongs la //
T06TD4020E:38a-28: brtse bcas khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
T06TD4020E:38a-29: lhun gyis grub cing chags mi mnga' //
T06TD4020E:38a-30: thogs bar mi mnga' rtag par ni //
T06TD4020E:38a-31: mnyam par bzhag cing 'dri kun gyi //
T06TD4020E:38a-32: lan ldon khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
T06TD4020E:38a-33: rten dang brten pa bshad bya dang //
T06TD4020E:38a-34: gsung dang mkhyen pa 'chad byed la //
T06TD4020E:38a-35: blo gros rtag thogs mi mnga' ba //
T06TD4020E:38a-36: legs ston khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
T06TD4020E:38a-37: gshegs nas spyod pa mkhyen mdzad de //
T06TD4020E:38a-38: de dag skad kyis sems can gyi //
T06TD4020E:38a-41: lus can kun gyis khyod mthong na //
T06TD4020E:38a-42: skyes bu dam pa lags par 'tshal //
T06TD4020E:38a-43: mthong ba tsam gyis rab dang bar //
T06TD4020E:38a-44: mdzad pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
T06TD4020E:38a-45: len dang gnas dang gtong ba dang //
T06TD4020E:38b-0: sprul dang yongs su sgyur ba @38b dang ;
T06TD4020E:38b-1: / ting nge 'dzin dang ye shes la //
T06TD4020E:38b-2: mnga' brnyes khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
T06TD4020E:38b-3: thabs dang skyabs dang dag pa dang //
T06TD4020E:38b-4: theg chen nges par 'byung ba la //
T06TD4020E:38b-5: sems can rnams la rab slu ba'i //
T06TD4020E:38b-7: rang gzhan don du ye shes dang //
T06TD4020E:38b-8: spangs dang nges 'byung bgegs mdzad par //
T06TD4020E:38b-9: ston mdzad mu stegs gzhan dag gis //
T06TD4020E:38b-10: mi brdzi khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
T06TD4020E:38b-11: bsrung med bsnyel ba mi mnga' bar //
T06TD4020E:38b-12: 'khor gyi nang na bag brkyang gsung //
T06TD4020E:38b-13: kun nas nyon mongs gnyis spangs pa //
T06TD4020E:38b-15: kun mkhyen khyod la rgyu ba dang //
T06TD4020E:38b-16: gnas pa kun la rtag par ni //
T06TD4020E:38b-17: kun mkhyen min spyod mi mnga' ste //
T06TD4020E:38b-18: yang dag don ldan khyod phyag 'tshal //
T06TD4020E:38b-19: sems can kun gyi bya ba la //
T06TD4020E:38b-20: khyod ni dus las mi 'da' bas //
T06TD4020E:38b-21: mdzad pa rtag tu don mnga' ba //
T06TD4020E:38b-22: mi bsnyel khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
T06TD4020E:38b-23: 'jig rten kun la nyin mtshan du //
T06TD4020E:38b-24: lan drug tu ni so sor gzigs //
T06TD4020E:38b-25: thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa //
T06TD4020E:38b-26: phan dgongs khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
T06TD4020E:38b-27: spyod pa dang ni rtogs pa dang //
T06TD4020E:38b-28: ye shes dang ni phrin las kyis //
T06TD4020E:38b-29: nyan thos rang sangs rgyas kun gyi //
T06TD4020E:38b-30: bla ma khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
T06TD4020E:38b-31: sku gsum dag gis byang chub che //
T06TD4020E:38b-32: rnam pa kun brnyes thams cad du //
T06TD4020E:38b-33: sems can kun gyi the tshom dag gcod pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
T06TD4020E:38b-34: 'dzin pa mi mnga' nyes mi mnga' //
T06TD4020E:38b-35: rnyog pa mi mnga' mi gnas pa //
T06TD4020E:38b-36: mi g-yo chos rnams thams cad la //
T06TD4020E:38b-37: spros med khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
T06TD4020E:38b-38: dam pa'i don ni grub pa ste //
T06TD4020E:38b-39: sa kun las ni nges par byung //
T06TD4020E:38b-40: sems can kun gyi mchog tu gyur //
T06TD4020E:38b-41: sems can thams cad rnam grol mdzad //
T06TD4020E:38b-42: yon tan mi zad mnyam med ldan //
T06TD4020E:38b-44: snang la lha dang mi rnams kyis //
T06TD4020E:38b-45: rnam pa kun tu mi mthong ngo //
T06TD4020E:39a-2: gdul bya'i skal ba ji bzhin du //
T06TD4020E:39a-3: srid pa ji ltar gnas kyi bar //
T06TD4020E:39a-4: de yi mdzad pa rgyun mi 'chad //
T06TD4020E:39a-5: theg pa chen po mdo sde'i rgyan las /
T06TD4020E:39a-6: spyod pa dang mthar thug pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o /
T06TD4020E:39a-9: // / theg pa chen po mdo sde'i rgyan ces bya ba'i tshig le'ur byas pa 'phags pa byams pas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T06TD4020E:39a-11: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po sh'akya sim ha dang /
T06TD4020E:39a-12: zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba bande dpal brtsegs la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa /
T06TD4020E:39a-13: slad kyi pandi ta pa ra hi ta dang /
T06TD4020E:39a-14: bram ze chen po sad dza na dang /
T06TD4020E:39a-15: lo ts'a ba dge slong blo ldan shas rab kyis cung zad bcos legs par bshad nas gtan la phab pa'o /
T06TD4020E:39a-17: // / mjug gi shlo ka gcig po 'di 'gro don 'phel ba dang gzhung gzhan na 'dug pa ltar bris pa'o /
T06TD4020E:39a-21: // / ye dharm'a he tu pra bha w'a he tunte sh'a na ta th'a ga to hya wa da ta /
T06TD4020E:39a-22: te sh'a nytsa yo ni ro dha ae wam b'a d'i ma h'a shra ma na: //
